thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Allison

author: Allison
title: Allison
text: I've ordered over 20 books using ThriftBooks. Most orders arrived within two weeks in the condition stated on the site. Recently, I ordered three books each with an audio tape attached, however the audio tapes were missing. ThriftBooks addressed the issue quickly and professionally. I will continue to order from ThriftBooks because of the stellar customer service and low priced books.
